lead_paragraph: First-year Sun coach Curt Miller said when he was hired that he wanted to change the culture in Connecticut after the team finished last in the Eastern Conference for three straight seasons.

headline.print_headline: Connecticut Sun Off to Slow Start, Sit at Bottom of AP Poll
headline.main: Connecticut Sun Off to Slow Start, Sit at Bottom of AP Poll

snippet: First-year Sun coach Curt Miller said when he was hired that he wanted to change the culture in Connecticut after the team finished last in the Eastern Conference for three straight seasons....
